about_the_game:
The Rebels have developed a shrinking weapon to enforce their plans with brute force. However, their creation has turned against them. Among the Rebels hide Spies, who have shrunk everyone in a desperate attempt to sabotage the group's ambitions.

Now, the Spies must await reinforcements without revealing their identities, while the Agents are on a mission to expose them and execute a series of takedowns to reclaim control.

How to Play:

Tiny Takedowns is a social deduction game where you must deceive your friends or uncover their secrets! Play with 3-12 friends online and prove who is the ultimate Spy or the smartest Rebel!

Before each round, players have time to choose between 3 unique skills or special weapons to enhance their gameplay. This ensures every match feels fresh and exciting. With a bit of luck, you might get your hands on particularly powerful skills, determined by their rarity.

Once the preparation phase ends, roles are assigned:

  • Rebels: The majority team must work together to uncover clues, identify the Spies, and eliminate them. But beware - taking out an innocent friend will weigh heavily on your conscience and come with a significant penalty!

  • Spies: As the underdog team, your goal is to survive, confuse, or take out the Rebels. Helping uncover clues that incriminate you might grant you unique weapons, allowing for better defense or secret sabotage to claim victory. However, if you're exposed, your location will be revealed to everyone!

Shrinking the world, one takedown at a time. Ready to uncover secrets, create chaos, and outplay your friends? Welcome to Tiny Takedowns!
